string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_ROBE1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to wear cloth equipment, and boosts your defense each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_SEMI_ROBE1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to wear semi-cloth equipment, and boosts your defense each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_HIGH_LEATHER1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to wear high-leather equipment, and boosts your defense each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_PLATE1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to wear plate equipment, and boosts your defense each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_BOW1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to use bows, and boosts your attack power each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_BOOK1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to use spellbooks, and boosts your attack power each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_SWORD1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to use one-handed weapons, and boosts your attack power each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_SCIMITAR1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to use scimitars, and boosts your attack power each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_Gloves1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to use gloves, and boosts your attack power each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_CLAW1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to use claws, and boosts your attack power each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EQUIP_POLEARM1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to use polearms, and boosts your attack power each time the skill level upgrades.

string.name: STR_SKILL_MASTERY_DUAL_DESC
string.body: Allows the simultaneous wielding of two one-handed weapons, one held in each hand.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PowerBlow_DESC
string.body: Gathers power and attacks the enemy with a powerful swing of the weapon.

string.name: STR_SKILL_ClashingHoly_DESC
string.body: Attacks an enemy with a ball of earth magic. It can inflict additional damage when used against a stumbled enemy.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Tornado_DESC
string.body: Creates a strong blast of wind around the target, attacking all enemies within the area of effect. It also slows the movement speed of enemies.

string.name: STR_SKILL_IceStorm_DESC
string.body: Creates a storm of ice around you, attacking all nearby enemies.

string.name: STR_BASICHARVEST_DESC
string.body: Allows you to pick up items from the ground.

string.name: STR_FORESTRY_DESC
string.body: The skill of logging trees or picking herbs

string.name: STR_GATHERING_DESC
string.body: The skill of harvesting fruits, vegetables and grains

string.name: STR_BLACKSMITH_DESC
string.body: The skill of creating metal items.

string.name: STR_COOKING_DESC
string.body: Allows you to make food and beverages that have effects when consumed. You may also purify contaminated materials.

string.name: STR_WEAPONSMITH_DESC
string.body: Allows you to craft metal weapons.

string.name: STR_ARMORSMITH_DESC
string.body: Allows you to craft metal armor, helmets and shields.

string.name: STR_TAILORING_DESC
string.body: Allows you to make cloth armor, leather armor and clothing with cloth and leather.

string.name: STR_LEATHERWORK_DESC
string.body: A skill of crafting leather items

string.name: STR_CARPENTRY_DESC
string.body: A skill of crafting items with wood.

string.name: STR_ALCHEMY_DESC
string.body: Allows you to make items that enhance various magical weapons, items and equipment.

string.name: STR_HANDIWORK_DESC
string.body: Allows you to craft precious metal, wooden weapons and small parts.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Stun_DESC
string.body: You've been buffeted with shock. You cannot do anything for a period of time.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Death_DESC
string.body: A temporary after-effect of death, which decreases movement speed for a short time.

string.name: STR_SKILL_TauntingBlow_DESC
string.body: Taunts an enemy with a light attack.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SlicingBlow_DESC
string.body: Inflicts a deep slash. If the skill is successful, you can use Stunning Blow.

string.name: STR_SKILL_StunningBlow_DESC
string.body: A strong attack that forces the enemy to Stumble. Available only after Slicing Blow is successful.

string.name: STR_LDF4a_Calydon_Patriarch_SkillAtkIns_SelfArea10m_DESC_Abnormal
string.body: You have been knocked to the ground by a powerful shock.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCFAIMAMHOWL_DESC
string.body: Paralyzes the enemy and prevents all actions.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCZOMBIEBITE_DESC
string.body: Poisons the target and slowly decreases its HP.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCTAILATTACK_DESC
string.body: Poisons the target and slowly decreases its HP.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCHARDSHELL_DESC
string.body: Surrounds your body with a shell to block enemy attacks.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCORCHISHBERSERK_DESC
string.body: Enters the Berserk mode, which increases your attack power but decreases your defense.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCORCHISHFOCUS_DESC
string.body: Boosts your concentration to raise the chance of critical hits.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCSHADOWBLADE_DESC
string.body: Collapses the target's stance, preventing it from taking any action.

string.name: STR_SKILL_NPCMIMICPRESS_DESC
string.body: The target continues to bleed and slowly loses HP.

string.name: STR_Skill_DownwardBlow_DESC
string.body: A downward strike at a fallen enemy. It can be used only against a Stumbled enemy.

string.name: STR_Skill_ShieldBash_DESC
string.body: Bashes with the shield and Staggers the enemy. Available only after Block is successful.

string.name: STR_Skill_MultipleBlow_DESC
string.body: Hits the enemy repeatedly and strikes a fierce blow to finish them off.

string.name: STR_Skill_Rage_DESC
string.body: Decreases your Defense for a short time in order to increase Attack prowess.

string.name: STR_Skill_TripleEdge1_DESC
string.body: Slashes the enemy rapidly. The first skill of the Triple Edge Chain Skill.

string.name: STR_Skill_TripleEdge2_DESC
string.body: Slashes at an enemy to inflict a deep wound. The second skill of the Triple Edge Chain Skill.

string.name: STR_Skill_TripleEdge3_DESC
string.body: Lands a critical attack on the wounded enemy to Stagger it. The third skill of the Triple Edge Chain Skill.

string.name: STR_Skill_BreathBreaker_DESC
string.body: Strikes at a fallen enemy to finish it off. Can be used only against a Stumbled enemy.

string.name: STR_Skill_RipostingEdge_DESC
string.body: Attacks a vulnerable spot and Stumbles the enemy. Available only after Parry is successful.

string.name: STR_Skill_RapidShot_DESC
string.body: Fires a Misery Shot at your enemy.

string.name: STR_Skill_EntangleShot_DESC
string.body: Strikes at the enemy's legs to lower its movement speed.

string.name: STR_Skill_WolfClaw_DESC
string.body: Concentrates your effort on inflicting a critical hit. Your accuracy decreases while you are concentrating.

string.name: STR_Skill_ShineStrike_DESC
string.body: A ferocious swing at the enemy.

string.name: STR_Skill_BindCircle_DESC
string.body: Binds and immobilizes all enemies within a radius of the target.

string.name: STR_Skill_Regeneration_DESC
string.body: Slowly restores the target's HP over a period of time.

string.name: STR_Skill_Purification_DESC
string.body: Removes altered states of the target.

string.name: STR_Skill_Protection_DESC
string.body: Increases the target's physical defense for a period of time to protect it from enemy attacks.

string.name: STR_Skill_WindSpear_DESC
string.body: Throws a spear of wind magic at the enemy. If the skill is successful, you can use Explosion.

string.name: STR_Skill_Explosion_DESC
string.body: Attacks the enemy's vulnerable wounds and Stumbles it. Available only after the Scream of Wind Soul is successful.

string.name: STR_Skill_FireShard_DESC
string.body: Attacks the enemy with a dagger of fire.

string.name: STR_Skill_MarbleFlame_DESC
string.body: Throws a powerful ball of fire at the enemy.

string.name: STR_Skill_LightningProphecy_DESC
string.body: Summons lightning to attack the enemy.

string.name: STR_Skill_ManaRegeneration_DESC
string.body: Increases your Mana Recovery rate for a period of time.

string.name: STR_Skill_DPATK1_DESC
string.body: Gathers the power of holy light and detonates it to destroy all nearby enemies. After casting the skill, you lose all DP.

string.name: STR_Skill_DPHeal_DESC
string.body: Sends your power of light to an ally who is gathering the power of holy light. Your DP is completely transferred to the ally. Once used, the DP is never returned.

string.name: STR_Skill_JumpBlow_DESC
string.body: Jump attacks the enemy and Stumbles it.

string.name: STR_Skill_SpinBlow_DESC
string.body: A strong spin attack Staggers nearby enemies.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_HP_01_DESC
string.body: Slowly recovers HP for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_HP_02_DESC
string.body: Slowly recovers HP for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_MP_01_DESC
string.body: Slowly recovers MP for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_MP_02_DESC
string.body: Slowly recovers MP for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_STR_VIT_01_DESC
string.body: Increases STR and VIT for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_STR_VIT_02_DESC
string.body: Increases STR but decreases VIT for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_AGI_DEX_01_DESC
string.body: Increases AGI and DEX for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_AGI_DEX_02_DESC
string.body: Increases AGI but decreases DEX for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_KNO_WIL_01_DESC
string.body: Increases KNO and WIL for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_DISH_KNO_WIL_02_DESC
string.body: Increases KNO but decreases WIL for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_MUSHROOM_01_DESC
string.body: Increases movement and attack speeds for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_MUSHROOM_02_DESC
string.body: Increases Accuracy and Evasion for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_MUSHROOM_03_DESC
string.body: Increases Physical and Magical Attacks significantly for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_EARTH_DESC
string.body: Increases Earth Resistance for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_WATER_DESC
string.body: Increases Water Resistance for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_FIRE_DESC
string.body: Increases Fire Resistance for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_AIR_DESC
string.body: Increases Wind Resistance for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_LIGHTNESS_DESC
string.body: Increases Magical Attack for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_CRYSTAL_DARKNESS_DESC
string.body: Increases Physical Attack for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_SCROLL_CRITICAL_DESC
string.body: Increases the chance of critical hits for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_SCROLL_SPEED_DESC
string.body: Increases movement speed for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_SCROLL_HASTE_DESC
string.body: Increases attack speed for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_GALL_WORM_DESC
string.body: Increases STR significantly for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_GEM_SHINING_DESC
string.body: Restores a significant amount of MP.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_POTION_HP_SMALL_DESC
string.body: Restores a small amount of HP.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_POTION_MP_SMALL_DESC
string.body: Restores a small amount of MP.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_HERB_ANGELICA_DESC
string.body: Restores a small amount of HP.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_HERB_TARRAGON_DESC
string.body: Restores a small amount of MP.

string.name: STR_ITEM_E3_HERB_GINSENG_DESC
string.body: Restores small amounts of HP and MP.

string.name: STR_Skill_StumbleStun_DESC
string.body: You fell down after receiving a strong shock. You cannot do anything for a period of time.

string.name: STR_Skill_Guard_DESC
string.body: Lifts the shield and prepares for enemy's attack.

string.name: STR_SYSTEM_SKILL_POLYMORPH_FUNGUS_DESC
string.body: You have temporarily become a Fungen.

string.name: STR_Skill_StunningImpact_DESC
string.body: Shakes the ground and Stumbles nearby enemies. If the skill is successful, you can use Chastise and Clashing Impact.

string.name: STR_Skill_Chastisement_DESC
string.body: Summons a Luminary Dagger to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack speeds. Available only after the Stunning Impact is successful.

string.name: STR_Skill_Ward_DESC
string.body: Increases the target's physical defense for a period of time to protect it from enemy attacks.

string.name: STR_Skill_BasicShock_DESC
string.body: Gives the enemy a small shock to Stagger it.

string.name: STR_SKILL_BattleMaster_DESC
string.body: Increases your maximum HP, physical and magical attacks, depending on the skill level.

string.name: STR_Skill_ClashingImpact_DESC
string.body: Summons the power of earth to inflict great damage on the enemy. Available only after the Stunning Impact is successful.

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_FLYMAXTIME_01
string.body: Maximum Flight Time Increase Test Scroll 1

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_FLYMAXTIME_02
string.body: Maximum Flight Time Increase Test Scroll 2

string.body: Increases maximum flying time by 20 seconds for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_FLYMAXTIME_02_DESC
string.body: Increases maximum flying time by 50 percent for its duration.

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_FLYCOOLTIME_01_DESC
string.body: Reduces Flying cooldown time by 5 minutes.

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_FLYCOOLTIME_02_DESC
string.body: Reduces Flying cooldown time by 50 percent.

string.name: STR_ITEM_TEST_REBIRTH_DESC
string.body: Automatically resurrects you if you die while the spell is in effect.

string.name: STR_Skill_Spin_DESC
string.body: You spun backward after receiving a strong shock. You cannot do anything for a period of time.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_RobustHit_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_AvengingCrash_G1_DESC
string.body: When Block is successful, inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target by bashing it with the shield, and stuns it temporarily. A shield required.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_RobustBlow_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 2 Ferocious Strike – Robust Blow.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_BlowHateUp_DESC
string.body: Physical Strike + Enmity Increase Attacks a target and increases its enmity toward you.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_StatUpPhysicalDefense_DESC
string.body: Magical Physical Defense Buff Boosts your physical defense.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_StatUpPhysicalOffense_DESC
string.body: Magical Physical Attack Buff Boosts your physical attack.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_Provoke_G1_DESC
string.body: Taunts a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you to increase its Enmity toward you.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_AssaultStabber_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target, and causes additional [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] physical damage if used on the target's back.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_BlowBleed_DESC
string.body: Physical Strike + Bleeding Strikes a target and causes it to bleed.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_SwiftEdge_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_SwiftShock_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 2 Swift Edge – Soul Slash

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_WhisperofWind_G1_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.AlwaysDodge.RemainTime], can dodges [%e1.AlwaysDodge.Count] physical attack(s) or resist [%e2.AlwaysResist.Count] magical attack(s).

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_Hide_G1_DESC
string.body: Enters basic stealth for [%e1.Hide.RandomTime]~[%e1.Hide.RemainTime]. The skill decreases the movement speed by [%e1.Hide.Speed]%% while in effect. Unable to use during battle.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_StatUpCritical_DESC
string.body: Crit Spell Chance Buff Temporarily increases your critical hit chance significantly.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_HateDown_DESC
string.body: Magical Enmity Reduction Reduces the target's enmity toward you.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_HallowSwing_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. The target's attack speed decreases for [%e2.Slow.RemainTime]. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_BlessofRock_G1_DESC
string.body: Buffs a target's [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%%, and [%e1.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e1.StatUp.Value2] for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime]. Target must be within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_Blind_DESC
string.body: Magical Blindness Debuff Decreases the target's accuracy.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_Heal_G1_DESC
string.body: Restores the HP of a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you by [%e1.Heal_Instant.Heal].

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_DispelPhysical_DESC
string.body: Remove magical altered states Cures the target of physical altered states.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_Revive_G1_DESC
string.body: Resurrects a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you.

string.name: STR_SKILL_MA_FlameBolt_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_MA_DelayedExplosion_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.DelayedSpellATK_Instant.MinDamage] ~ [%e1.DelayedSpellATK_Instant.MaxDamage] magical wind damage after a delay of [%e1.DelayedSpellATK_Instant.DelayedTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_MA_GravityCage_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical earth damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you, and deals further [%e2.SpellATK.Damage] damage every [%e2.SpellATK.CheckTime] for [%e2.SpellATK.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_MA_BurningShield_G1_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.Reflector.RemainTime], returns [%e1.Reflector.Damage] damage back to an enemy within [%e1.Reflector.MaxRange]m that [%e1.Reflector.Condition]s you.

string.name: STR_SKILL_MA_ShortTeleport_DESC

string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_SandstormTrap_G2_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_EmergencyShield_G1_DESC

The protective shield remains effective until it absorbs a total of [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_ExplosionTrap_G3_DESC
string.body: Uses 4 Tripeed Fruits to set a trap. The trap lasts for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy comes within 5m of the trap, it explodes, causing damage to enemies within a 10m radius.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_SandstormTrap_G1_DESC
string.body: Uses 3 Tripeed fruits to set up a ranged trap around you. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime]. It blinds a target within a 10m radius and lengthens the casting time of its magical skills. While the trap is active, the target gradually loses HP.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_SandstormTrap_G2_DESC
string.body: Uses 5 Tripeed Fruits to set a trap. The trap lasts for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy comes within 5m of the trap, it explodes, causing blindness, increased casting time, and gradual HP loss to a target within a 10m radius.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_ThornburstTrap_G1_DESC
string.body: Uses 2 Tripeed fruits to set up a trap. Remaining effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], the trap reduces the movement speed of the enemy that approaches within a 5m radius and also causes it to bleed.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_VacuumTrap_G1_DESC
string.body: Uses 9 Tripeed branches to set up a trap. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime]. It inflicts magical wind damage on a target within a 5m radius and silences it.

It inflicts additional [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] damage if dealt behind the target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_HealingTank_G1_DESC

But only those who stay within [%e1.HealCastorOnAttacked.EffectArea]m radius of the target can restore their HP. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Order_ElementalField_G1_DESC
string.body:
Commands the spirit to use its magical buff on up to 6 allies within a 15m radius.
Water Spirit: Increases Magical Accuracy and Magical Resistance Wind Spirit: Increases Accuracy and Evasion Rate Earth Spirit: Restores HP and cures Physical and Mental Altered States Fire Spirit: Increases Physical Attack and reflects damage Magma Spirit: Restores HP and increases Physical Attack Tempest Spirit: Increases Magical Accuracy, Magical Resistance, Accuracy and Evasion Rate.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Order_ElementalFist_G1_DESC
string.body:
Commands the spirit to use its attack skill. Each spirit has its element-specific ranged strike, and a chance of producing an additional effect.
Water Spirit: Reduces Water Resist Wind Spirit: Reduces Wind Defense Earth Spirit: Reduces Earth Resist Fire Spirit: Reduces Fire Resist.

string.name: STR_GNAS_DotDelaySpell_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_GNFI_SKnockdown_Nr_DESC

string.body: Inflicts damage and weakens overall physical properties.

string.name: STR_GNRA_SatkTALong_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_GNWI_DotDelaySpell_Fire_Sp_DESC

string.name: STR_GNWI_Reflector_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_GNWI_SpellDotSnare_Water_DESC

string.name: STR_GNWI_SpellKDSA_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_NAS_SatkApBleAdd_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_NGR_Snare_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_NRA_BleedKDLrMiddle_Nr_DESC

string.name: STR_NSC_StunSA_Nr_DESC

string.body: You are blinded, and your movement speed has decreased. You can remove altered states by using physical healing magic or potion.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_PandemoniumDrain_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_CeletialImage_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_CeletialBarrier_G1_DESC

The protective shield absorbs [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage each time and remains effective until it absorbs a total of [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_CeletialBarrier_G1_Abnormal

string.name: STR_SKILL_CL_PandemoniumRegrowth_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_MA_PandemoniumFocus_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_BackAssault_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target, and decreases its [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime]. It inflicts additional [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] damage if dealt behind the target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_BlindingBurst_G2_DESC
string.body: Blinds the nearby enemies within a 15m radius of you for [%e1.Blind.RandomTime]~[%e1.Blind.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_Blindside_G3_DESC
string.body: Jumps behind a target's back within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m to inflict [%e1.MoveBehindATK.MinDamage]~[%e1.MoveBehindATK.MaxDamage] physical damage. May also stun it. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_CarveSignet_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.CarveSignet.MinDamage]~[%e1.CarveSignet.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and has a chance to carve a rune on the target up to [%e1.CarveSignet.SignetGrade] level. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_CarveSignetChain_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.CarveSignet.MinDamage]~[%e1.CarveSignet.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and engraves a signet pattern on the target up to [%e1.CarveSignet.SignetGrade] level. Chain Skill Level 2 Rune Carve – Sigil Strike Stigma acquired

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_CorruptingCut_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target, and an additional [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] damage when the target is poisoned or stunned. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_DarknessIllusion_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and deals an additional random damage if used on its back.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_DashAttack_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.DashATK.MinDamage]~[%e1.DashATK.MaxDamage] physical damage by dashing to the target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_DeadlyCounter_G1_DESC
string.body: Upon success of Parry, inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_FlashBomb_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on enemies around a selected spot within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you, and also blinds them.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_FlowingSpiner_G3_DESC
string.body: Upon successful Evasion, inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and puts it in the [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddEffect] state. Chain Skill Level 1

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_FrontAssault_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. If the skill is used in front of the target, it inflicts additional damage on the target and causes it to spin. Chain Skill Level 1

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_GamblersIntention_G1_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillCritical.RemainTime], increases the critical hit chance of your [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillCritical.BoostCount]th attack skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_HeavensEdge_G3_DESC
string.body: Detonates the Runes carved on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m up to [%e1.SignetBurst.SignetGrade] runes, damaging and putting the target in the [%e1.SignetBurst.AddEffect] state.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_HellsBlade_G3_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target immobilized in mid-air, and then knocks it out of the sky.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_PoisoningIntention_G4_DESC
string.body: Uses 4 Scolopen Poison to spread poison on a weapon. For [%e1.Provoker.RemainTime] each attack has a [%e1.Provoker.ConditionProb]%% chance of poisoning the target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_ShadowWalk_G1_DESC
string.body: Increases your [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%% and [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value]%% for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SignetAssault_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.CarveSignet.MinDamage]~[%e1.CarveSignet.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and engraves a signet pattern on the target up to [%e1.CarveSignet.SignetGrade] level. Chain Skill Level 3 Soul Slash – Rune Slash

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SignetImolation_G1_DESC
string.body: Erases the Pattern engraved on the target up to [%e1.SignetBurst.SignetGrade] runes, damaging the target. Additionally it deals continuous damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SignetNova_G1_DESC
string.body: Detonates the Runes carved on a target up to [%e1.SignetBurst.SignetGrade] runes, damaging the target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SilentDagger_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and silences it.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SpectralMirrior_G1_DESC
string.body: Resists up to [%e1.AlwaysResist.Count] magical attacks for [%e1.AlwaysResist.RemainTime]. But [%e2.StatDown.StatName] also decreases as a side effect.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SpectralWalk_G1_DESC
string.body: Removes the effect of poisoning, bleeding and continuous damage from yourself, and you enter the advanced hide state without affecting the movement speed for [%e2.Hide.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_StrikingIntention_G3_DESC
string.body: Boosts the effect of the [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillAttack.AttackType] used right after the skill by [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillAttack.BonusRate]%%, and increases your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value]. In addition, increases the value for Stun, Spin, Knock Back, Stumble, and Aether's Hold Resistance Penetration by [%e2.StatUp.Value2]. Lasts for [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillAttack.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_VisiousEye_G2_DESC
string.body: Performs critical hit attacks up to [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillCritical.BoostCount] times for [%e1.OneTimeBoostSkillCritical.RemainTime]. However, your [%e2.StatDown.StatName] decreases by [%e2.StatDown.Value].

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_WindWalk_G2_DESC
string.body: You enter advanced stealth for [%e1.Hide.RandomTime] ~ [%e1.Hide.RemainTime], during which your movement speed increases. You may use buff magic and skills on yourself three times and still remain in stealth. Available during battle Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_WoundingSlash_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target, and aggravates damage of poisoning if it is poisoned already.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_ArcaneAftershock_G2_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.Provoker.RemainTime], whenever the target [%e1.Provoker.Condition]s, it has a [%e1.Provoker.ConditionProb]%% chance to suffer damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_CastersPraise_G1_DESC
string.body: Allows you and your group members within [%e1.Aura.Range]m radius to cast magical attack skills faster, and also increases their effectiveness. Active Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Chant_ClementMind_G3_DESC
string.body: Restores the MP of you and your group members within [%e1.Aura.Range]m radius of you by [%e1.Aura.OtherSkill.e1.MPHeal.CheckTimeHeal]. Active Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Chant_ElementalResist_G2_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Chant_ImprovedAttack_G4_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Chant_ImprovedCritical_G2_DESC

Active Skill Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Chant_ImprovedEvade_G3_DESC
string.body: Increases the Block, parry and evasion rates of you and your group members within [%e1.Aura.Range]m radius of you. Active Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Chant_ImprovedHaste_G3_DESC
string.body: Increases the attack speed of you and your group members within [%e1.Aura.Range]m radius of you. Active Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Chant_ImprovedMove_G4_DESC
string.body: Increases [%e1.Aura.OtherSkill.e1.StatUp.StatName] of you and your group members within [%e1.Aura.Range]m radius of you by [%e1.Aura.OtherSkill.e1.StatUp.Value]. Active Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_CrossCounter_G1_DESC
string.body: Upon success of Parry, inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Crusader_G1_DESC
string.body: Creates a shield that reduces the received damage by [%e0.CH_Crusader_G1_Effect.e1.Shield.CoverValue]%% around you and your group members within [%e1.Aura.Range]m of you (This shield does not break). Active Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_EnergySink_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATKDrain.Damage] magical damage on the target for [%e1.SpellATKDrain.RemainTime], and absorbs HP from the enemy equal to the amount of damage inflicted on it.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_FallenBear_G1_DESC
string.body: Transforms into an Ettin for [%e1.ShapeChange.RemainTime]. While you are transformed, your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e2.StatUp.Value] and [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e3.StatUp.Value].

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_HealersPraise_G1_DESC
string.body: Enables you and your group members within [%e1.Aura.Range]m radius to cast healing skills faster, and also increases their effectiveness. Active Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_ImbueEarth_G4_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.Provoker.RemainTime], each time you attack there is a [%e1.Provoker.ConditionProb]%% chance of decreasing the enemy's attack speed.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_ImprovedAllDefend_G2_DESC
string.body: Increases [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value] and [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value] of your group members within a 20m radius of you for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Jihad_G1_DESC
string.body: Increases the attack speed and shortens the skill casting time of you and your group members within [%e1.Aura.Range]m radius of you. Active Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_ParryingStrike_G3_DESC
string.body: Upon success of parry, inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target, and stuns it temporarily.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_PentacleShock_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and puts it in the [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddEffect] state. Chain Skill Level 3 Incandescent Blow – Pentacle Shock.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_RaisingRush_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and puts it in the [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddEffect] state.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_SonicAssault_G3_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_WeedShape_G1_DESC
string.body: Transforms you into a weed for [%e1.ShapeChange.RemainTime]. You can't move while the skill is in effect.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_AssaultStabber_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target, and causes additional [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] physical damage if used on the target's back.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_CounterSlash_G5_DESC
string.body: Upon successful Evasion, inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Can also stun the target. Chain Skill Level 1

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_SwiftEdge_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_SwiftShock_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 2 Swift Edge – Soul Slash

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_WhisperofWind_G4_DESC
string.body: You evade a total of [%e1.AlwaysDodge.Count] physical attacks for a period of [%e1.AlwaysDodge.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_ArmorBreak_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and reduces their [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime]. Chain Skill Level 1

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_AvengingCrash_G5_DESC
string.body: Upon success of Block, inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target by bashing it with the shield, and stuns it temporarily. A shield required Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_Provoke_G4_DESC
string.body: Taunts a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you to increase its Enmity toward you.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_Rage_G5_DESC
string.body: Increases your [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value] for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime], and forms a protective shield that has a [%e2.Shield.ConditionProb]%% chance to absorb [%e2.Shield.CoverValue] damage, up to [%e2.Shield.ShieldValue] damage, whenever you're subject to [%e2.Shield.Condition]. Chain Skill Level 2 Ferocious Strike – Rage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_RobustBlow_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 2 Ferocious Strike – Robust Blow.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WA_RobustHit_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_AdvenceCast_G1_DESC
string.body: The casting time of [%e1.BoostSkillCastingTime.SubType] is shortened by [%e1.BoostSkillCastingTime.CastingBonus]%%.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_AdvenceMagic_G1_DESC
string.body: The effects of magic skills are increased by [%e1.BoostSpellAttackEffect.EffectBonus1]%%.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_AreaMagma_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on enemies in a 5m radius of a selected spot within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you, and deals further [%e2.SpellATK.Damage] damage every [%e2.SpellATK.CheckTime] for [%e2.SpellATK.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_AreaTidal_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical water damage on enemies in a 5m radius of a selected spot within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you, and deals further [%e2.SpellATK.Damage] damage every [%e2.SpellATK.CheckTime] for [%e2.SpellATK.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_BurningFinger_G3_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m. If the target is stunned, the skill deals additional damage on it and increases its Enmity.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_BurningShield_G4_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.Reflector.RemainTime], returns [%e1.Reflector.RateDamage] damage back to an enemy within [%e1.Reflector.MaxRange]m that [%e1.Reflector.Condition]s you.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_CeletialPortal_G1_DESC
string.body: Summons a magical gate leading to %0 bind point (your registered point) for you and your group members.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_CursedTree_G2_DESC
string.body: Transforms the target into a tree for [%e1.Deform.RemainTime]. The transformed target cannot move or act, and its [%e3.StatUp.StatName] increases. Once the target is attacked, the effect disappears immediately. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_Dark_FrostPillar_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts magical water damage on up to 6 enemies within a selected area and reduces their movement speed for 20 seconds. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_DarkPortal_G1_DESC
string.body: Summons a magical gate leading to %0 bind point (your registered point) for you and your group members.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_DelayedExplosion_G5_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.DelayedSpellATK_Instant.Damage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you, after a delay of [%e1.DelayedSpellATK_Instant.DelayedTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_FireShooter_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target immobilized in mid-air and within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_FlameCage_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you, and deals further [%e2.SpellATK.Damage] damage every [%e2.SpellATK.CheckTime] for [%e2.SpellATK.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_FrozenField_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] water damage on the enemies within a 15m radius of you, and immobilizes them for [%e2.Root.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_GainMana_G2_DESC
string.body: Instantly recovers your MP by [%e1.MPHeal_Instant.Heal] and then recovers [%e2.MPHeal.CheckTimeHeal] MP every [%e2.MPHeal.CheckTime] for [%e2.MPHeal.RemainTime]. While the skill is in effect, you fall asleep.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_GlacialSwam_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical water damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m. Chain Skill Level 2 Flood – Ice Cyclone

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_HydroBurst_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical water damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_HydroPress_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical water damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_Light_FrostPillar_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts magical water damage on up to 6 enemies within a selected area and reduces their movement speed for 20 seconds. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_MagicFist_G3_DESC
string.body: Strikes down a target immobilized in mid-air that is within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you and inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_MagmaBlazing_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on the target, and reduces [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime]. Chain Skill Level 1

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_MagmaExplosion_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 2 Blazing Magma – Lava Tsunami

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_MassExplosion_G4_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you and on up to 6 enemies within a 5m radius of the target. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_MysticShell_G3_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.Shield.RemainTime], each time you receive [%e1.Shield.Condition], you can avoid up to [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage with the probability of [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% and recover your MP by [%e2.MPHeal.CheckTimeHeal] every [%e2.MPHeal.CheckTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_QuickCasting_G2_DESC
string.body: Shortens your magic casting time by [%e1.BoostSkillCastingTime.CastingBonus]%% for [%e1.BoostSkillCastingTime.RemainTime]. In the meantime, your [%e2.StatDown.StatName] decreases.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_ShockFlame_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on the target. The enemy in the [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.AddEffectCondition] state receives an additional [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.AddDamage] damage. Chain Skill Level 3 Delayed Smash – Magma Eruption

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_ShockGranade_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on the target. The target is put in the [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.AddEffect] state if it is already in the [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.AddEffectCondition] state. Chain Skill Level 3 Delayed Smash – Fire Column

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_Sleep_G3_DESC
string.body: Forces a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m to fall asleep for [%e1.Sleep.RemainTime] and increases [%e2.StatUp.StatName].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_SoulFreeze_G3_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m as well as silencing it for [%e2.Silence.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_TidalImpact_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical water damage on the target, and reduces [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime]. Chain Skill Level 1

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_TidalWave_G2_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical fire damage on a stumbled target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_WizardryHook_G3_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical damage on a ground target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you, and puts it in the [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.AddEffect] state.

string.body: Uses 6 Seeds of Transformation to transform you into an Guardian for [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.RemainTime]. While transformed, you can resist most altered states, you recover [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e1.ProcHeal_Instant.Heal] HP and [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e2.ProcMpHeal_Instant.Heal] MP, and you increase your [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value], [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value2], [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value3], [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e4.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e4.StatUp.Value], and [%e3.StatUp.StatName] by [%e3.StatUp.Value]. You inflict additional damage to enemy players.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Dark_Avatar_G1_L_Abnormal
string.body: You have transformed into a Guardian General. Increases [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value], [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value2], [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e3.StatUp.Value3], and [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e4.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.SkillLauncher.OtherSkill.e4.StatUp.Value]. In addition, your movement and flight speeds have increased, you are resistant to most altered states. and you inflict additional damage to enemy players.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Stigma_HydroPress_G2_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_Stigma_RobustBlow_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage instantly to the target, and inflicts an additional [%e2.SpellATK.Damage] damage every [%e2.SpellATK.CheckTime] for [%e2.SpellATK.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_Stigma_CounterSlash_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to the target after evading. The target becomes stunned for [%e2.Stun.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_Stigma_ImbueEarth_G1_Abnormal

string.name: STR_SKILL_Stigma_EntangleShot_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_Stigma_DashAttack_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_Stigma_AvengingCrash_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Order_Decaying_DESC
string.body:
Commands the spirit to use its attack skill. Each spirit has a skill that inflicts element-specific sustainable damage on enemies, decreases their defense to the elements, and increases their item drop rate.
Water Spirit: Reduces Water Defense Wind Spirit: Reduces Wind Defense Earth Spirit: Reduces Earth Defense Fire Spirit: Reduces Fire Defense Magma Spirit: Reduces Fire and Earth Defenses Tempest Spirit: Reduces Water and Wind Defenses.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Pet_Interupt_DESC
string.body:
Commands the spirit to attack. Each spirit has a skill that inflicts element-specific damage and a weakening effect.
Water Spirit: Water damage Wind Spirit: Stuns Earth Spirit: Absorbs some damage as HP Fire Spirit: Reduces physical defense Magma Spirit: Absorbs some damage as HP and reduces physical defense Tempest Spirit: Water damage and Stuns.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_FairyFlare_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_SpiralStab_DESC

string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m, and there is a chance of decreasing its movement speed for [%e2.Snare.RandomTime]~[%e2.Snare.RemainTime]. Chain Skill Level 2 Cleave - Force Cleave.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_HeavyImpact_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the enemies within a 10m radius of you and decreases their movement speed for [%e2.Snare.RandomTime]~[%e2.Snare.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_DivineRage_G4_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to the target. The target becomes [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddEffect]. This skill is highly accurate.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_AbysalRage_G4_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to the target. The target becomes [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddEffect]. This skill is highly accurate.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_EnergyWing_G1_DESC
string.body: Removes all magical movement-impairing debuffs, and increases your [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value]%%, [%e4.StatUp.StatName] by [%e4.StatUp.Value], and [%e4.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e4.StatUp.Value2] for [%e2.StatUp.RemainTime], enabling flight without consuming flight time.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_BladeMode_G1_DESC
string.body: [%e2.StatBoost.StatName] is increased by [%e2.StatBoost.FixValue]. You deal an additional 25%% damage when attacking a player. Active Skill Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_BleedingSword_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to the target and causes it to bleed for [%e2.Bleed.RemainTime]. Chain Skill Level 3 Rage – Slash Artery

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_FrozingShield_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to the target. Can only be used after a successful block. Shield required. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_ConquestMind_G1_DESC
string.body: Recovers your HP by [%e1.Heal.CheckTimeHeal] every [%e1.Heal.CheckTime] for [%e1.Heal.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_DivineJudgement_G4_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage and additional Enmity to the target. Additionally, with a shield equipped blocks all attacks for [%e0.KN_DivineJudgement_G4_Buff.e1.AlwaysBlock.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_AbysalJudgement_G4_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to the target, causing extra enmity, and creates a shield for you that absorbs [%e0.KN_AbysalJudgement_G4_Buff.e1.Shield.CoverValue]%% damage and reflects [%e0.KN_AbysalJudgement_G4_Buff.e2.Reflector.FixedDamage] damage for [%e0.KN_AbysalJudgement_G4_Buff.e1.Shield.RemainTime]. The shield absorbs up to a total of [%e0.KN_AbysalJudgement_G3_Buff.e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_BreakPower_G3_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to a stumbled target, and decreases its [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime]. While the skill is in effect, your [%e0.KN_BreakPower_G3_Buff.e1.StatUp.StatName] increases by [%e0.KN_BreakPower_G3_Buff.e1.StatUp.Value]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_PurifyWing_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_GodsVoice_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_DivineBolt_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical wind damage to a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_BindingHeal_G1_DESC
string.body: Can be used on an ally within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m to restore [%e1.Heal_Instant.Heal] HP. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_DivineCircle_G1_DESC
string.body: Instantly recovers the HP of a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you and up to 6 allies within a 25m radius of the target by [%e1.Heal_Instant.Heal]. Additionally, recovers allies HP by [%e2.Heal.CheckTimeHeal] every [%e2.Heal.CheckTime] for [%e2.Heal.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_AbysalCircle_G1_DESC
string.body: Recovers the HP of a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you and up to 6 allies within a 25m radius of the target by [%e1.Heal_Instant.Heal], and forms a shield for [%e2.Shield.RemainTime] that can block [%e2.Shield.CoverValue] damage each time, up to [%e2.Shield.ShieldValue] damage, whenever you receive [%e2.Shield.Condition].

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_AbysalCircle_G1_Abnormal

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Chant_ImprovedFly_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_HeroicStrike_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to a stunned target and causes it to become [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddEffect]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_EternalSeal_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_AngelicWish_G1_DESC
string.body: Creates a shield for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime] that can block damage with [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% probability each time you and your allies within a 20m radius receive [%e1.Shield.Condition], and recovers HP by [%e2.Heal.CheckTimeHeal] every [%e2.Heal.CheckTime]. The shield blocks [%e1.Shield.CoverValue]%% of the damage you receive until it blocks a total of [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage.

string.body: [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% chance to block [%e1.Shield.CoverValue]%% damage from each [%e1.Shield.Condition], up to a total of [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage. Also heals for [%e2.Heal.CheckTimeHeal] every [%e2.Heal.CheckTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_DemonicWish_G1_DESC
string.body: Creates a shield for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime] that can block damage with [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% probability each time you and your allies within a 20m radius receive [%e1.Shield.Condition]. The shield blocks [%e1.Shield.CoverValue]%% of the damage you receive until it blocks a total of [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_DemonicWish_G1_Abnormal
string.body: [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% chance to block [%e1.Shield.CoverValue]%% damage from each [%e1.Shield.Condition], up to a total of [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_ShockArrow_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_RootArrow_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m, immobilizes it for [%e2.Root.RemainTime], and decreases its [%e3.StatDown.StatName] by [%e3.StatDown.Value].

string.name: STR_SKILL_SC_TrueShotMind_G1_DESC

Decreases your [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value]%%. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_HeavensTrap_G4_DESC
string.body: Uses 5 Tripeed seeds to set up a single trap around you. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime]. When an enemy approaches within a 5m radius, it explodes to immobilize the enemy in mid-air. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_HeavensTrap_G4_DESC
string.body: Uses 5 Tripeed seeds to set up a single trap around you. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime]. When an enemy approaches within a 5m radius, it explodes to immobilize the enemy in mid-air. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_ResistMind_G1_DESC
string.body: Removes 1 physical debuff on you and enables you to resist [%e2.AlwaysResist.Count] magical attacks within [%e2.AlwaysResist.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_PhoenixArrow_G1_DESC
string.body: Fires an arrow at a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m, dealing [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage. This attack has low accuracy.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_DestructArrow_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_BackdashStab_G4_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.BackDashATK.MinDamage]~[%e1.BackDashATK.MaxDamage] physical damage to the target, and you jump back 25m. The target may become stunned for [%e2.Stun.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_BackdashStab_G5_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.BackDashATK.MinDamage]~[%e1.BackDashATK.MaxDamage] physical damage to the target, and you jump back 25m. The target may become stunned for [%e2.Stun.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_DestructionTrap_G1_DESC
string.body: Sets up a trap. The trap lasts for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy approaches within a 10m radius, it explodes, inflicting damage on up to 4 nearby enemies.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_DestructionTrap_G1_DESC
string.body: Sets up a trap. The trap lasts for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy approaches within a 10m radius, it explodes, inflicting damage on up to 4 nearby enemies.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Stigma_DivineCircle_G1_DESC
string.body: Stigma skill of an Ancient Daeva. Instantly recovers HP of target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you and that of up to 6 allies within a 25m radius of the target by [%e1.Heal_Instant.Heal], and additionally recovers their HP by [%e2.Heal.CheckTimeHeal] every [%e2.Heal.CheckTime] for [%e2.Heal.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

Recovers the HP of a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you and that of up to 6 allies within a 25m radius of the target by [%e1.Heal_Instant.Heal], and forms a protective shield for [%e2.Shield.RemainTime] that can block [%e2.Shield.CoverValue] damage each time, up to [%e2.Shield.ShieldValue] damage, whenever you receive [%e2.Shield.Condition]. string.name: STR_SKILL_Test_Stat_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime], increases the target's [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value], [%e1.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e1.StatUp.Value2], and [%e1.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e1.StatUp.Value3], and decreases [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value], [%e2.StatDown.StatName2] by [%e2.StatDown.Value2], and [%e2.StatDown.StatName3] by [%e2.StatDown.Value3].

string.name: STR_SKILL_Test_Stat_Abnormal

string.name: STR_EVENT_Christmas_Santa_HPMPBuff_DESC
string.body: Nyerk nyerk nyerk! Merry Solorius, one and all!

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_Stigma_DrainCut_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MinDamage]-[%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to a stumbled enemy and absorbs [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.HPHeal]%% of the damage as HP. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_Stigma_ForceBurst_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you and up to 18 enemies within a 10m radius of the target, and decreases their [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_Stigma_ShockBurst_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to up to 18 enemies within a 10m radius, and decreases their [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_Stigma_ResistArmor_G1_DESC
string.body: Increases your [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value] for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_Stigma_GodPunishment_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to the target and stuns it for [%e2.Stun.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_Stigma_GodPunishment_G1_Abnormal
string.body: Stunned. Can't move, use skills and items, or attack.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_Stigma_DemonPunishment_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to the target and absorbs [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.HPHeal]%% of the damage as HP. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Stigma_TigerEye_G1_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.WeaponStatUp.RemainTime], the [%e1.WeaponStatUp.StatName] of [%e1.WeaponStatUp.WeaponCategory]s decreases by 10m while [%e2.WeaponStatUp.StatName] increases by [%e2.WeaponStatUp.Value]%% and [%e3.WeaponStatUp.StatName] increases by [%e3.WeaponStatUp.Value]%%. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Stigma_TigerEye_G1_Abnormal
string.body: [%e1.WeaponStatUp.StatName] of [%e1.WeaponStatUp.WeaponCategory]s decreased by 10m. [%e2.WeaponStatUp.StatName] increased by [%e2.WeaponStatUp.Value]%% and [%e3.WeaponStatUp.StatName] increased by [%e3.WeaponStatUp.Value]%%.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Stigma_AncientArrow_G1_DESC
string.body: Fires an arrow at a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m to inflict [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage. This attack has low accuracy. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Stigma_MysticArrow_G1_DESC
string.body: Fires an arrow at a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m to inflict [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage]~[%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage. This attack has low accuracy. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_Stigma_ShadowWalk_G1_DESC
string.body: You enter advanced stealth for [%e1.Hide.RemainTime]. Your movement speed decreases by [%e1.Hide.Speed]%% while in effect. You may use buff magic and skills on yourself three times and still remain in stealth. Can't be used during battle. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_Stigma_SunBurst_G1_DESC
string.body: Detonates up to [%e1.SignetBurst.SignetGrade] runes on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m, dealing damage, and also temporarily silencing the target and reducing its attack speed. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_Stigma_MoonBurst_G1_DESC
string.body: Detonates up to [%e1.SignetBurst.SignetGrade] runes on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m dealing damage to the target and healing you for a portion of that damage. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Stigma_Suggestion_G1_DESC
string.body: Calms a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you and up to 6 enemies within 20m of the target, reducing their Enmity towards you. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Stigma_DivineSanctuary_G1_DESC
string.body: Instantly recovers the HP of a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you and up to 6 allies within a 25m radius of the target by [%e1.Heal_Instant.Heal], and additionally recovers their HP by [%e2.Heal.CheckTimeHeal] every [%e2.Heal.CheckTime] for [%e2.Heal.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Stigma_AbysalSanctuary_G1_DESC
string.body: Recovers the HP of a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you and up to 6 allies within a 25m radius of the target by [%e1.Heal_Instant.Heal], and forms a shield for [%e2.Shield.RemainTime] that can block [%e2.Shield.CoverValue] damage each time, up to [%e2.Shield.ShieldValue] damage, whenever you receive [%e2.Shield.Condition]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Stigma_AbysalSanctuary_G1_Abnormal
string.body: Blocks [%e2.Shield.CoverValue] damage from each [%e2.Shield.Condition], up to [%e2.Shield.ShieldValue] damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Stigma_RecoverWord_G1_DESC
string.body: Heals a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you by [%e1.Heal_Instant.Heal], and additionally heals them by [%e2.Heal.CheckTimeHeal] every [%e2.Heal.CheckTime] for [%e2.Heal.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Stigma_AngelicWall_G1_DESC
string.body: Creates a shield for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime] that has a [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% chance of blocking damage each time you and up to 6 allies within a 20m radius receive [%e1.Shield.Condition], and also recovers [%e2.Heal.CheckTimeHeal] HP every [%e2.Heal.CheckTime] (The shield blocks [%e1.Shield.CoverValue]%% of the damage you receive per attack until it blocks a total of [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage). Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Stigma_AngelicWall_G1_Abnormal
string.body: [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% chance to block [%e1.Shield.CoverValue]%% damage from each [%e1.Shield.Condition], up to a total of [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage. Also heals for [%e2.Heal.CheckTimeHeal] every [%e2.Heal.CheckTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Stigma_DemonicWall_G1_DESC
string.body: Creates a shield for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime] that has a [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% chance of blocking damage each time you and up to 6 allies within a 20m radius receive [%e1.Shield.Condition] (The shield blocks [%e1.Shield.CoverValue]%% of the damage you receive per attack until it blocks a total of [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage). Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_Stigma_DemonicWall_G1_Abnormal
string.body: [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% chance to block [%e1.Shield.CoverValue]%% damage from each [%e1.Shield.Condition], up to a total of [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage.

string.body: Deals [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical water damage to a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_Light_Stigma_VolcanicFlame_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.DelayedSpellATK_Instant.Damage] magical fire damage to a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m and up to 6 enemies within a 10m radius of the target after [%e1.DelayedSpellATK_Instant.DelayedTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_Dark_Stigma_LavaWave_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Stigma_StormBlade_G1_DESC
string.body: Deals [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical wind damage to a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m of you, and deals a further [%e2.SpellATK.Damage] damage every [%e2.SpellATK.CheckTime] for [%e2.SpellATK.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Stigma_Order_EtherEruption_G1_DESC
string.body:
Commands the spirit to consume its HP in a magical elemental attack dealing area effect damage. It deals additional damage if the target is an Asmodian or a Balaur. Stigma Skill.
Water Spirit: Magical Water Strike Wind Spirit: Magical Wind Strike Earth Spirit: Magical Earth Strike Fire Spirit: Magical Fire Strike Tempest Spirit: Magical Water Strike.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Stigma_Order_ShadowEruption_G1_DESC
string.body:
Commands the spirit to consume its HP in a magical elemental attack dealing area effect damage. It deals additional damage if the target is an Elyos or a Balaur. Stigma Skill.
Water Spirit: Magical Water Strike Wind Spirit: Magical Wind Strike Earth Spirit: Magical Earth Strike Fire Spirit: Magical Fire Strike Magma Spirit: Magical Earth Strike.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Test_PvPRemainTimeRatio50_DESC
string.body: Set PvPRemainTimeRatio to 50. Cut the effect duration to half.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Test_PvPRemainTimeRatio200_DESC
string.body: Set PvPRemainTimeRatio to 200. Double the effect duration.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Test_PvPDamageRatioPhy50_DESC
string.body: Set PvPDamageRatio to 50. Any physical skill must have 0.3 times the effect.

string.name: STR_SKILL_Test_PvPDamageRatioMag50_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Light_EternalServent_G1_DESC
string.body: Summons a holy spirit near you. This spirit does not move from the summoned spot, and inflicts [%e0.EternalServent_G1.e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] long-range fire damage to a selected target within a 30m radius. This spirit vanishes after a while and consumes its HP with each attack. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Dark_EternalServent_G1_DESC

This spirit vanishes after a while and consumes its HP with each attack. Stigma Skill.

The protective shield blocks [%e1.Shield.CoverValue]%% damage from each attack. Stigma Skill.

string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATKDrain_Instant.FixDamage] fire damage to a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius, and drains its HP by [%e1.SpellATKDrain_Instant.HPHeal]%% and MP by [%e1.SpellATKDrain_Instant.MPHeal]%% of the total damage inflicted. Chain Skill Level 2 Remove Shock - Vengeful Backdraft

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_CountHPMPDrain_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATKDrain_Instant.FixDamage] fire damage to a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius, and absorbs [%e1.SpellATKDrain_Instant.HPHeal]%% of the inflicted damage as HP and [%e1.SpellATKDrain_Instant.MPHeal]%% of the inflicted damage as MP.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_ElementalCharge_G1_DESC
string.body: Recovers the HP of a spirit within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius by [%e1.Heal_Instant.Heal]%% and removes all magical debuffs from it. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_SleepingSpirit_G1_DESC
string.body: Forces a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius to fall asleep for [%e1.Sleep.RemainTime] and increases its [%e2.StatUp.StatName]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_DespairCurse_G1_DESC
string.body: Transforms a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius into a Fire Spirit for [%e1.Fear.RemainTime] and causes fear. Chain Skill Level 2 Remove Shock - Flames of Anguish

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_EnervationCurse_G1_DESC
string.body: Reduces the maximum HP and maximum MP of a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius by [%e1.Curse.Value] each for [%e1.Curse.RemainTime]. It can be removed with a Dispel Magical Debuff skill. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_EnervationCurse_Abnormal

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_EternalShield_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Order_Omen_G1_DESC
string.body: Commands the spirit to use its Altered State skills. The spirit possesses the target and puts it into sleep, reducing attack speed and increasing all elemental defense of the target before disappearing. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_HellCurse_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Light_EternalServent_G2_DESC
string.body: Summons a holy spirit near you. This spirit does not move from the summoned spot, and inflicts [%e0.EternalServent_G2.e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] long-range fire damage on a selected target within a 30m radius. This spirit vanishes after a while and consumes its HP with each attack. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Dark_EternalServent_G2_DESC
string.body: Summons a holy spirit near you. This spirit does not move from the summoned spot, and inflicts [%e0.EternalServent_G2.e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] long-range fire damage on a selected target within a 30m radius. This spirit vanishes after a while and consumes its HP with each attack. Stigma Skill.

string.body: Waiting for the battle to begin.

string.name: STR_IDHouse_Zadra2_DranaBuff2_DESC_Abnormal

string.name: STR_IDForest_Wave_Trico_Sequela_DESC_Abnormal

string.body: You gain 20%% additional XP from hunting creatures while this effect is active.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_JumpingCut_DESC
string.body: Charges at a stumbled target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m and chops downward to inflict [%e1.DashATK.MinDamage] ~ [%e1.DashATK.MaxDamage] physical damage and reduces [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_SeismicDrain_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MinDamage] ~ [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on enemies with 7m of you and absorbs [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.HPHeal]%% of the damage as HP. Chain Skill Level 1 Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_CryingInsult_DESC
string.body: Taunts up to 6 enemies within a 8m radius of you to increase their Enmity, and blocks one physical attack with your shield within 12 seconds.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_ThunderBlade_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] ~ [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_BasicShot_DESC
string.body: Fires an arrow at a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you that inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] ~ [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_DrainEye_DESC
string.body: For [%e1.Provoker.RemainTime], there is a [%e1.Provoker.ConditionProb]%% chance of recovering your MP with each attack. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_DrainEye_Abnormal
string.body: There is a [%e1.Provoker.ConditionProb]%% chance of recovering MP with each attack.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_ShadowDodge_DESC
string.body: You move [%e1.RandomMoveLoc.Distance]m forward instantly, and all immobilization and movement speed reduction debuffs are removed. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_TigerBeat_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.CarveSignet.MinDamage] ~ [%e1.CarveSignet.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and carves a level [%e1.CarveSignet.SignetGrade] rune on the target.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_PunishingLight_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical wind damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m and decreases their [%e2.StatDown.StatName] by [%e2.StatDown.Value] for [%e2.StatDown.RemainTime]. Chain Skill Level 1.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_HealingGrace_DESC
string.body: Increases the effect of healing magic on group members within 25 m of the caster by 50%% for [%e1.DeboostHealAmount.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_SoaredRock_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] ~ [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a stunned or stumbled target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance] m radius and binds it for [%e2.bind.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.body: You parry up to [%e1.AlwaysParry.Count] physical attacks for [%e1.AlwaysParry.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_VitalityDrain_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATKDrain_Instant.FixDamage] magical water damage on a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance] m radius of you, and absorbs [%e1.SpellATKDrain_Instant.HPHeal]%% of the damage as HP.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_Light_SummonTornado_DESC
string.body: Summons a tornado that remains on a spot within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance] m of you for [%e1.SummonSkillArea.SummonTime]. It inflicts continuous magical wind damage on up to 6 enemies within a 10 m radius and temporarily stuns them. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_Dark_SummonTornado_DESC
string.body: Summons a tornado that remains on a spot within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance] m of you for [%e1.SummonSkillArea.SummonTime]. It inflicts continuous magical wind damage on up to 6 enemies within a 10 m radius and temporarily stuns them. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_VacuumExplosion_DESC

string.body: Recovers the MP of a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance] m radius of you by [%e1.MPHeal_Instant.Heal]%%.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_Sleep_Scarecrow_DESC
string.body: Transforms a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance] m radius of you into a scarecrow. The target is put to sleep for [%e1.Sleep.RemainTime] and its [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increases.

string.name: STR_SKILL_WI_Sleep_Corn_DESC
string.body: Transforms a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance] m radius of you into a Frightcorn. The target is put it to sleep for [%e1.Sleep.RemainTime] and its [%e2.StatUp.StatName] increases.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Fear_Porguss_DESC
string.body: Transforms a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance] m radius of you into a Poppy for [%e1.Fear.RandomTime] ~ [%e1.Fear.RemainTime] and strikes it with fear.

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Fear_Saam_DESC
string.body: Transforms a target within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius of you into a Ginseng for [%e1.Fear.RandomTime] ~ [%e1.Fear.RemainTime] and strikes it with fear.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Light_HolySilika_G1_DESC
string.body: Summons a Divine Mirror near you. This mirror does not move from the summoned spot, and inflicts [%e0.HolySilika_G1.e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] long-range magical fire damage on a selected target within a 25 m radius. The mirror vanishes after a certain time and consumes its own HP with each attack.

The mirror vanishes after a certain time and consumes its own HP with each attack.

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_S5_Pr_DivineTouch_G3_DESC

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_S5_Ma_EarthGrab_G2_Abnormal
string.body: Your movement speed has been decreased, and you suffer [%e2.SpellATK.Damage] damage every [%e2.SpellATK.CheckTime]. You can remove the Altered State by using magic or potions.

string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical earth damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m, and causes it to become [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.AddEffect].

string.name: STR_IDArena_Solo_S5_Ma_Sleep_G1_DESC
