string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_ConsecutiveHit_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 2 Weakening Severe Blow , Enfeeblement Severe Blow, Infringement Severe Blow – Energy Impact.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_Fortitude_G1_DESC
string.body: Reflects [%e1.Reflector.FixedDamage] of the damage received back to the enemy, and absorbs [%e2.Provoker.OtherSkill.e1.ProcHeal_Instant.Heal] HP of the target that used [%e1.Reflector.Condition] on you for [%e1.Reflector.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_Fortitude_Abnormal
string.body: You are reflecting [%e1.Reflector.FixedDamage] of the damage received back to the enemy, and absorbing [%e2.Provoker.OtherSkill.e1.ProcHeal_Instant.Heal] HP of the target that used [%e1.Reflector.Condition] on you.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_SpinningParry_G1_DESC
string.body: Increases your [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value] for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_CounterDrain_G1_DESC
string.body: After a successful parry, has a chance to inflict [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and absorbs [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.HPHeal]%% of the damage as HP.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_TripleSlash_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Multicast 2 Times Chain Skill Level 2 Body Smash – Body Combo

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_WhirlDrain_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on enemies within 7m of the caster and absorbs [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.HPHeal]%% of the damage as HP. Multicast 3 Times Chain Skill Level 1 Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_FI_WhirlTornado_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on enemies within 7m of the caster and absorbs [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.HPHeal]%% of the damage as HP. Chain Skill Level 2 Exhausting Wave (3 Times) - Revival Wave Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_CounterOffensive_G1_DESC
string.body: A successful Block increases your [%e1.StatUp.StatName], [%e1.StatUp.StatName2] and [%e1.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%%, [%e1.StatUp.Value2] and [%e1.StatUp.Value3] respectively for [%e1.StatUp.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_CounterOffensive_Abnormal
string.body: [%e1.StatUp.StatName], [%e1.StatUp.StatName2] and [%e1.StatUp.StatName3] have been increased by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%%, [%e1.StatUp.Value2] and [%e1.StatUp.Value3] respectively.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_MovingStance_G1_DESC
string.body: Increases your [%e1.StatUp.StatName] by [%e1.StatUp.Value], [%e1.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e1.StatUp.Value2]%%, [%e1.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e1.StatUp.Value3], [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value], [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e2.StatUp.Value2], and [%e2.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e2.StatUp.Value3]. This skill is cancelled if another skill is used. You cannot jump while using this skill. Shield required. Stigma Skill

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_MovingStance_G1_Abnormal
string.body: [%e1.StatUp.StatName] has increased by [%e1.StatUp.Value], [%e1.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e1.StatUp.Value2]%%, [%e1.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e1.StatUp.Value3], [%e2.StatUp.StatName] by [%e2.StatUp.Value], [%e2.StatUp.StatName2] by [%e2.StatUp.Value2], [%e2.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e2.StatUp.Value3]%%, and [%e2.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e2.StatUp.Value3].

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_ProtectShield_G1_DESC
string.body: Has a [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% chance to create a shield for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime] that can block [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage per attack up to a total damage of [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] for party members within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m each time they receive [%e1.Shield.Condition]. This skill is exclusively used with group members.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_ProtectShield_Abnormal
string.body: A shield has been created that can absorb [%e1.Shield.CoverValue] damage per attack up to [%e1.Shield.ShieldValue] damage, with chance of receiving [%e1.Shield.ConditionProb]%% whenever you receive [%e1.Shield.Condition].

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_TripleSnacher_G1_DESC
string.body: Pulls up to 3 enemies within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m radius before you, increases Enmity, and decreases their movement speed for [%e2.Snare.RemainTime]. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_WindBlade_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on up to 6 enemies between you and a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m, and makes them stumble.

string.name: STR_SKILL_KN_ShieldStrike_G1_DESC
string.body: Hits with your shield and inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Multicast 3 Times Chain Skill Level 2 Shield Bash – Successive Shield Shock

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_SnakeBiteTrap_G1_DESC
string.body: Sets up a ranged trap around you. The trap remains active for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime] and inflicts damage on up to 4 enemies once an enemy gets within 10m. Those struck by the trap are also immobilized in mid-air. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_DrainShot_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m, absorbing [%e1.SkillATKDrain_Instant.MPHeal]%% of the damage as MP. Chain Skill Level 3 Fleshcutter Arrow - Manaleech Shot

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_VenomShot_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m. If the target is poisoned, inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] additional damage.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_RapidShot_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage to a target that is already stunned, knocked back, stumbled, spun, or immobilized in mid-air. Has a range of [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_ThroughShot_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on up to 6 enemies within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m. Has a chance to also stun them. Multicast 3 Times

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_Tumbling_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.BackDashATK.MinDamage] - [%e1.BackDashATK.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target and launches you back 15m. The target may also be stunned.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_ShadowDrop_G1_DESC
string.body: Grabs a stunned target and inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage, causing them to stumble in the process. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_PollutionCut_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target, and an additional [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.AddDamage] damage if the target is poisoned or stunned. Multicast 3 Times Chain Skill Level 2 Assassination - Killing Spree

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_StraightCounter_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MinDamage] - [%e1.SkillATK_Instant.MaxDamage] physical damage on the target. Chain Skill Level 2 Counterattack, Whirlwind Slash -- Cross Slash

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_Light_DefendRoar_G1_DESC
string.body: You transform into a Slayer for [%e1.ShapeChange.RemainTime]. While you are transformed, your [%e2.StatUp.StatName], [%e2.StatUp.StatName2], and [%e2.StatUp.StatName3] increase by [%e2.StatUp.Value], [%e2.StatUp.Value2], and [%e2.StatUp.Value3], respectively, and you recover MP quickly. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_Light_DefendRoar_Abnormal
string.body: Transforms you into a Slayer, and increases your [%e2.StatUp.StatName], [%e2.StatUp.StatName2], and [%e2.StatUp.StatName3] by [%e2.StatUp.Value], [%e2.StatUp.Value2], and [%e2.StatUp.Value3], respectively. You also recover MP quickly.

string.name: STR_SKILL_AS_GenocidalSword_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.CarveSignet.MinDamage] - [%e1.CarveSignet.MaxDamage] physical damage on up to 6 enemies between you and a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m, and engraves a pattern (up to level [%e1.CarveSignet.ChangeSignetGrade]). Struck enemies are poisoned and suffer [%e2.Poison.Damage] damage every [%e2.Poison.CheckTime] for [%e2.Poison.RemainTime]. Their movement speed is also slowed.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_LightningShock_G1_DESC
string.body: Inflicts [%e1.SpellATK_Instant.FixDamage] magical wind damage on a target within [%First_Target_Valid_Distance]m. Chain Skill Level 2 Smite, Punishing Earth – Flashbolt.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_OffensiveMode_G1_DESC
string.body: Increases your [%e1.StatBoost.StatName] by [%e1.StatBoost.FixValue] and [%e2.StatBoost.StatName] by [%e2.StatBoost.FixValue], but reduces [%e3.StatDown.StatName] by 250. Active Skill Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_OffensiveMode_Abnormal

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_Purify_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_PR_HarshPain_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_TripleThrust_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_CH_ImprovedPowerAttack_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_EL_Pet_WideTaunt_G1_DESC
string.body:
Commands the spirit to use its Taunt skill. Each spirit has a skill that provokes enemies around it.
Water Spirit: Increases Enmity (medium) Wind Spirit: Increases Enmity (weak) Earth Spirit: Increases Enmity (Strong) Fire Spirit: Increases Enmity (Medium) Magma Spirit: Increases Enmity (strong) Tempest Spirit: Increases Enmity (strong).

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_HeavensTrap_G6_DESC
string.body: Uses 10 Tripeed seeds to set up a single trap around you. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime]. If an enemy gets within 5m of the trap, it explodes, immobilizing the enemy in mid-air. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_HeavensTrap_G6_DESC
string.body: Uses 10 Tripeed seeds to set up a single trap around you. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime]. If an enemy gets within 5m of the trap, it explodes, immobilizing the enemy in mid-air. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_BlazingTrap_G3_DESC
string.body: Uses 20 Tripeed Seeds to set up a single type trap around you. The trap remains active for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime] and explodes when an enemy approaches. It has a 5m area of effect. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_BlazingTrap_G3_DESC
string.body: Uses 20 Tripeed Seeds to set up a single type trap around you. The trap remains active for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime] and explodes when an enemy approaches. It has a 5m area of effect. Stigma Skill.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_SpikeTrap_G5_DESC
string.body: Uses 10 Tripeed seeds to set up a single trap around you. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy gets within 5m, the trap explodes, immobilizing the enemy and reducing its evasion rate.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_SpikeTrap_G5_DESC
string.body: Uses 10 Tripeed seeds to set up a single trap around you. The trap remains effective for [%e1.SummonTrap.SummonTime], and when an enemy gets within 5m, the trap explodes, immobilizing the enemy and reducing its evasion rate.

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Light_SpikeBiteTrap_G3_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_RA_Dark_SpikeBiteTrap_G3_DESC

string.name: STR_SKILL_Gm_Heal_G1_DESC

string.name: STR_IDEvent01_NormattackC_DESC
string.body: A common Shugo Warrior attack. Inflicts 250 physical damage on up to two enemies.

string.name: STR_IDEvent01_Powerattack_DESC
string.body: A powerful Ancient Shugo skill. Inflicts 3000 physical damage on the selected target.

string.name: STR_IDEvent01_Areaattack_DESC
string.body: Inflicts 566/567 damage on up to four nearby enemies.

string.name: STR_IDEvent01_Areadot_DESC
string.body: Consumes your DP to inflict 339 damage on up to 8 enemies within a [%First_Target_Valid_Distance] radius for [%e2.SpellATK.RemainTime] in [%e2.SpellATK.CheckTime] intervals.

string.name: STR_IDEvent01_Towerreflect_DESC
string.body: Consumes your DP to cast Reflective Aetheric Field on the Royal Tombstone. Deflects all enemy strikes for [%e1.Shield.RemainTime].

string.name: STR_item_IDEvent01_Towerheal_DESC
string.body: Instantly increases the HP of the Royal Tombstone by [%e1.StatUp.Value]%%,

string.name: STR_item_IDEvent01_AreaRoot2_DESC
string.body: Immobilizes all enemies inside Royal Tomb for 6 sec.
